content.rendered:
• Home
  • /
  • About Us
  • /
  • Meet the Doctor

Meet the Doctor

Tony Tropea, DC
Chiropractor located in Downtown Sunnyvale, Sunnyvale, CA

Tony Tropea, DC, is a kind and dedicated chiropractor providing gentle, effective care to men, women, and children in Downtown Sunnyvale, California. As the founder of Tropea Chiropractic Inc., Dr. Tropea has brought together top-notch providers to offer patients the best and most personalized care for their pain and health challenges.

Tropea Chiropractic Inc. utilizes chiropractic care, physical therapy, acupuncture, and massage therapy to alleviate low back pain, neck pain, shoulder pain, and injuries related to car accidents, slips, and falls and helps patients feel their best, lose weight, and enjoy life more. With a medical doctor on staff, the practice provides comprehensive care for adults and children.

Dr. Tropea became a chiropractor to provide noninvasive, natural solutions to pain without the use of drugs or side effects of invasive procedures. He enjoys developing one-on-one relationships with his patients and works hard to meet every person’s needs and health goals.

At Tropea Chiropractic Inc., the office has a complete in-house rehabilitation facility so patients can benefit from every aspect of their treatment plan under one roof. Treatments patients benefit from include Bemer mat therapy, electrical muscle stimulation, cold laser, and Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation (PNF) to improve circulation, relieve muscle spasms and trigger points, and reduce pain.

Tropea Chiropractic Inc. is accepting new patients. The practice promises to do everything possible to help patients recover at an affordable price. To schedule a visit, call, or book online now. 

Call us today at (408) 329-9604 to schedule an appointment
